title: Example of credit entry in CFA

content.question: Which of the following transactions in the balance of payments is recorded as a credit entry in a nation’s capital and financial account?

choices.label: The sale of common stock to foreign households
Imports of computers used by domestic businesses
The interest earned by the nation on foreign financial assets
The nation’s purchases of consumer goods from foreign firms
The nation’s purchases of accounting services from foreign firms

content.answer: The sale of common stock to foreign households

unit.text: 6: Open Economy - International Trade and Finance

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Identify an economic concept, principle, or model illustrated by an example.
